name: Can a monkys and a kittys be friends?
name_original: Can a monkys and a kittys be friends?
description:
This is a kittey game played with the mouse. I made it for Sylvie's Jam #1.

Featuring and starring music by _amaranthine.

My friends (maybe more) Bob and Frankie and June and Carol contributed various graphical assets and ideas.

I took a lot of time making it at a leisurely pace and had so much fun. Please enjoy or not i dont mind.

also in case you want to pay money for this i cant be bothered to do the tax form so please go buy the soundtrack instead
